about_the_game:
The mysterious yet mesmerizing official soundtrack of Scars Above will get you in the right mood for a sci-fi adventure.
The Scars Above’s Original Soundtrack includes 30 brilliantly-crafted tracks by talented composers and sound designers that brought the game’s vibrant atmosphere to life.
And for those of you in need for some guitar-shredding in your life, it also includes an awe-inspiring theme co-written by YouTube celebrity – TheDooo, that’ll blow your shoes off.
